title: Is Microblading, cutting, shaving or plucking eyebrows permissible in Islam? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: major sense plucking the eyebrows or shaving it or cutting it nowadays trendy is microblading which a lot of women do without asking not knowing that this they are cursed for removing the hair for microblading which is a form of tattooing when you start to slash and draw and get the blood and put something inside all of this
